name: Dead Stone (Method 9 Software)
description:
STORY

You play as an adventurer seeking the truth about an urban legend of ancient stone warriors that lies at the top of a mountain.

GAMEPLAY

  • Venture your way through 12 levels of fighting and looting.
  • Kill enemies to increase your score multiplier.
  • Gain bonus points by collecting pick-ups;
    • Weapon crates
    • Power-ups
    • Treasure

CONTROLS

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • LMB - Shoot

TROPHIES AND SCOREBOARD (Gamejolt Only)
